next_steps: Given the low customer hit rate, immediately schedule a meeting with the customer to understand their past experiences and address any concerns regarding our solutions and performance.
To improve the contract hit rate ratio, review the proposed contract terms with the customer, identifying and addressing any potential sticking points to ensure a mutually beneficial agreement.

Boost customer engagement by proactively sharing valuable industry insights, product updates, and relevant success stories to demonstrate our commitment and expertise, potentially showcasing the value of product B which they've purchased before.
